product_name: Fischer CRS Classic Vasa NIS Cross-Country Skis
long_description: The lightweight, stable CRS Classic Vasa NIS Cross-Country Skis are great entry-level race or fitness skis with easy kicking properties for fun days on the groomed trails of your local Nordic center.
short_description: The lightweight, stable CRS Classic Vasa NIS Cross-Country Skis are great entry-level race or fitness skis with easy kicking properties for fun days on the groomed trails of your local Nordic center.
